definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The Amazon River apparently changed its mind a few times in history.
sentences.chinese: 亚马孙河已经几度改变自己的主意了。

sentences.english: It has got the greatest river in the world, the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 它有世界上最大的河流亚马孙河。

sentences.english: The future of the Amazon Basin is now a subject of fierce debate.
sentences.chinese: 今天，亚马孙河流域的未来是一个热烈争论的话题。

sentences.english: At its mouth it is 220 miles wide.
sentences.chinese: 亚马孙河出海处宽约220英里。

sentences.english: Some hope to chart out that particular area of the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 有些榔学家希望对亚马孙河赌那一藤定区域进行坎察。

sentences.english: Amazon River is the current capacity most river in the world.
sentences.chinese: 亚马孙河是世界上流量最大的河。

sentences.english: This is a small community living on the upper reaches of the Amazon.
sentences.chinese: 这是居住在亚马孙河上游的一个小社区。

definition: Lake Victoria or Victoria Nyanza, Kenya, on the White Nile
inward flowing river/river flowing into desert or salt lake, e.g. Tarim river 塔里木河
Andes mountain chain of South America
inland river/river draining to inland sea
Lake Superior, one of the Great Lakes 五大湖[Wu3 da4 hu2]
Cordillera, series of mountain ranges stretching from Patagonia in South America through to Alaska and Aleutian islands
pinyin: Ke1 di2 le4 la1 shan1 xi4
